description: This file defines a Data Transfer Object (DTO) for login requests, encapsulating user email and password with validation constraints.

classes.name: LoginRequest
classes.description: A DTO class for capturing user login details including email and password with validation annotations.

methods.name: LoginRequest()
methods.description: Default constructor for the LoginRequest class.

methods.description: Parameterized constructor to initialize email and password fields.
